name: instant-static-site-vibe
label: Instant Static Site: Just Pass the Vibe
description: Deploy a static site instantly by just pasting your HTML into a text field. No files, no git, just vibes.
long_description: You know when you're just vibe coding? You've got a new component, a weird idea, or a snippet from CodePen, and you just want to see it *live*. On a real URL. Right now. This DA lets you paste your HTML code directly into the Schematics input. It spins up a public COS bucket, turns on website mode, and uploads your HTML string as index.html. That's it. You're live.

features.title: Paste Your HTML, Get a URL
features.description: No files, no repo. Just copy-paste your code into the text field and hit deploy. Deadass.

features.title: 0 to Live, Instantly
features.description: Goes from a code snippet to a live public URL in minutes. Perfect for testing a bit.

features.title: Serverless & Low-Key
features.description: Runs on IBM Cloud Object Storage (COS), so you don't have to manage servers. It's cheap and it just works.
